name: Word IQ Countries and Capitals 2
description:
Resolve 360 unique word puzzles with increasing difficulty. Puzzles start with 4 letters and go up to 49 letters as you progress in the game.

All the words are within the categories COUNTRY and CAPITAL of the World.

Challenge your Friends as you rank up in the Game Center Leaderboard.

As you play, you will get additional HINTS to help you solving a puzzle if you need some help.

NB: We have other unique word puzzles with different categories.
